prop.val: e.g. amanisukko he caused to believe from aman--s-ukko
makkittamaammo I aimed something from makk-s--am-aammo

SimR1985 pp. 17-19. The following template applies to the simple perfect and the imperfect tenses. The medial vowel –V is:–u simplePerf,-aa- presPerf,-oo- imperfect. Note that 3rd fem pl and 3rd pol pl are modeled on 3rd fem sg. This template is put into relation with progressive forms on p. 19.
